Products Customers

Leveraging mobile local landing pages led to...

42,840 incremental visits driven to stores

Challenge

Graeter’s Ice Cream, a national gourmet ice cream manufacturer, wanted  to increase their number of store visits, but were challenged with:

Effectively reaching nearby consumers  with a limited paid media budget
Increasing year over year same store revenue while driving traffic to new store openings

Dónde's Objective

Target digital consumers through local search and increase in-store visits.

Solution

Graeter's launched Dónde-powered local landing  pages to reach consumers through:

Mobile optimized landing pages for each retail store location
Location specific content
Adherence to SEO best practices to improve organic search results

Results

In just one year, Graeter's saw a per store ROI of $70.62.

Same store sales were up 5.12% and check average increased 2.37%
42,840 incremental store visits were driven to stores
Within one month, their newly opened Chicago store became the #1 Google result for their most important keyword in local search
